ground_truth: She finds the right page. Hermione glares at him. Xenophilius stares out of a window. Animated shadow puppets act out the story. Xenophilius moves from the window and finds a piece of paper. He takes a pen and draws a vertical straight line. He looks up, brushing back his long, straggly hair. Next, he draws a circle which contains the bottom half of the wand. Finally, he draws a triangle, surrounding the wand and the stone. Harry nods. Hermione looks anxious. He examines the teapot. He scuttles down the spiral staircase. Ron picks up his rucksack. They find Xenophilius by a window, muttering to himself. He rushes to the front door. He holds it shut. Looking desperate, he turns and faces them. They stare at him blankly. His hand over his heart, Xenophilius approaches Harry. He pushes the hair back from Harry's forehead, revealing the jagged scar. He fixes his eyes on Harry. Death eaters hurtle through the sky towards the house. Harry, Hermione, and Ron throw themselves to the floor. Flashes ricochet off the building as Xenophilius runs outside. Xenophilius is hit and falls to the ground. In the house, the three friends clasp hands and disapparate. The house is destroyed. They apparate in a forest. Ron walks past Hermione. He stops as a man stands up in front of him. Three others appear. Scabior, the Snatcher who smelled Hermione's perfume, leans against a tree. She turns and runs. Leaving their bags behind, Ron and Harry follow her. Half a dozen Snatchers set off in pursuit. Scabior joins the chase. The Snatchers fire with their wands and start gaining on them. Harry glances behind, trips, and falls. He scrambles to his feet. Scabior is chasing Hermione. A Snatcher aims his wand at Ron. It extends with a chain which winds itself around Ron's legs, tripping him up and binding his ankles together. A young Snatcher is in close pursuit of Harry. Harry ducks under a fallen tree. A Snatcher leaps down in front of him. Harry stumbles. He recovers and runs on. A chain loops around a tree close to Hermione. She fires an explosive from her wand, sending a Snatcher to the forest floor. Another appears in front of her. She turns and aims her wand at Harry. He falls heavily. The young thief. Voldemort dissolves in a swirling black cloud in front of the old Grindelwald. Harry gasps for breath. Hermione snatches off his glasses. They're captured. Hermione's spell has disfigured Harry's face. A Snatcher turns. A Snatcher, Greyback, tosses away Harry's wand. Approaching Hermione. Scabior touches her cheek and sniffs her neck. Scabior, his wand in his hand, walks over to Harry. He stops and studies him.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: She discovers the correct sheet. Hermione glowers at him. Xenophilius gazes out of a pane. Lively silhouette marionettes perform the tale. Xenophilius shifts from the pane and discovers a slip of parchment. He retrieves a quill and sketches a perpendicular straight stroke. He glances up, sweeping back his lengthy, unkempt mane. Next, he sketches a loop which encloses the lower portion of the scepter. Lastly, he sketches a polygon, encircling the scepter and the gem. Harry acknowledges. Hermione appears uneasy. He inspects the kettle. He scurries down the coiled staircase. Ron lifts his backpack. They locate Xenophilius by a pane, murmuring to himself. He dashes to the main entrance. He grips it closed. Looking despairing, he turns and confronts them. They gaze at him vacantly. His palm over his chest, Xenophilius advances toward Harry. He brushes the mane back from Harry's brow, unveiling the jagged blemish. He fixes his gaze on Harry. Death eaters speed through the atmosphere towards the dwelling. Harry, Hermione, and Ron hurl themselves to the ground. Bursts rebound off the structure as Xenophilius dashes outdoors. Xenophilius is struck and collapses to the earth. Inside the dwelling, the trio of comrades grip hands and vanish. The dwelling is demolished. They reappear in a woodland. Ron strides past Hermione. He halts as a figure rises in front of him. Three more materialize. Scabior, the Tracker who detected Hermione's fragrance, reclines against a trunk. She turns and flees. Leaving their packs behind, Ron and Harry pursue her. Six Snatchers embark in chase. Scabior partakes in the pursuit. The Snatchers discharge with their scepters and commence closing in on them. Harry peeks behind, stumbles, and collapses. He scrambles to his posture. Scabior is pursuing Hermione. A Snatcher targets his scepter at Ron. It elongates with a chain which coils itself around Ron's limbs, tripping him up and fastening his calves together. A youthful Snatcher is in near pursuit of Harry. Harry ducks underneath a toppled trunk. A Snatcher jumps down in front of him. Harry falters. He regains balance and sprints onward. A chain circles around a trunk close to Hermione. She discharges an explosive from her scepter, dispatching a Snatcher to the woodland ground. Another emerges in front of her. She turns and targets her scepter at Harry. He tumbles heavily. The youthful thief. Voldemort evaporates in a swirling dark mist in front of the old Grindelwald. Harry gasps for air. Hermione snatches off his spectacles. They're seized. Hermione's charm has marred Harry's visage. A Snatcher turns. A Snatcher, Greyback, flings away Harry's scepter. Approaching Hermione. Scabior caresses her cheek and inhales her scent. Scabior, his scepter in his grasp, strides over to Harry. He halts and observes him.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The right page is found by her. He is glared at by Hermione. A window is stared out of by Xenophilius. The story is acted out by animated shadow puppets. The window is moved from by Xenophilius, and a piece of paper is found by him. A pen is taken by him, and a vertical straight line is drawn. His long, straggly hair is brushed back as he looks up. Next, a circle is drawn by him, containing the bottom half of the wand. Finally, a triangle is drawn by him, surrounding the wand and the stone. Harry nods. An anxious look crosses Hermione's face. The teapot is examined by him. The spiral staircase is scuttled down by him. His rucksack is picked up by Ron. Xenophilius is found by them by a window, muttering to himself. The front door is rushed to by him. It is held shut by him. Looking desperate, they are turned back to and faced by him. He is stared at blankly by them. His hand over his heart, Harry is approached by Xenophilius. Harry's forehead is pushed back from by the hair, revealing the jagged scar. His eyes are fixed on Harry by him. The house is hurtled through the sky towards by Death Eaters. The floor is thrown to by Harry, Hermione, and Ron. Flashes ricochet off the building as outside runs Xenophilius. Xenophilius runs outside and is hit, falling to the ground. In the house, hands are clasped by the three friends, and they disapparate. The house is destroyed. In a forest, they apparate. Hermione is walked past by Ron. A stop is made by him as a man stands up in front of him. Three others appear. Scabior, the Snatcher who smelled Hermione's perfume, leans against a tree. She turns and runs. Leaving their bags behind, they are followed by Ron and Harry. In pursuit, half a dozen Snatchers set off. The chase is joined by Scabior. Their wands are fired by the Snatchers, and the trio is started gaining on. A glance backward is cast by Harry; he trips and falls. To his feet, he scrambles. Hermione is chased by Scabior. A Snatcher aims his wand at Ron. Around Ron’s legs, a chain is wound by itself, tripping him up and binding his ankles together. Harry is pursued closely by a young Snatcher. A fallen tree is ducked under by Harry. A Snatcher leaps down in front of him. A stumble occurs by Harry. He recovers and runs on. Around a tree close to Hermione, a chain is looped. From her wand, an explosive is fired by her, sending a Snatcher to the forest floor. In front of her, another appears. Her wand is turned and aimed at Harry by her. He falls heavily. The young thief. In front of the old Grindelwald, Voldemort dissolves in a swirling black cloud. For breath, Harry gasps. Off his glasses, they are snatched by Hermione. They're captured. Harry's face has been disfigured by Hermione's spell. A Snatcher turns. Harry's wand is tossed away by Greyback, the Snatcher. Approaching Hermione. Her cheek is touched by Scabior, and her neck is sniffed by him. Over to Harry walks Scabior, his wand in his hand. A stop is made by him, and he studies Harry.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: She finds the right page. Hermione glares. Xenophilius stares out the window. Animated shadow puppets depict the tale. He moves away, retrieves paper, and draws a vertical line. Brushing his straggly hair back, he adds a circle enclosing the wand's base, then a triangle around both wand and stone. Harry nods; Hermione looks anxious. Examining a teapot, he hurries down the spiral stairs. Ron grabs his rucksack. They find Xenophilius muttering by the window. He rushes to the door, holds it shut, then turns, desperate. Hand on heart, he approaches Harry, brushes back his hair, revealing the scar, and stares. Death Eaters soar toward the house. Harry, Hermione, and Ron dive to the floor. Flashes hit the building as Xenophilius runs out, is struck, and falls. Inside, the trio clasps hands and disapparates. The house explodes. They apparate in a forest. Ron walks past Hermione, stopping as a man rises before him. Three others appear. Scabior, who once smelled Hermione’s perfume, leans on a tree. She flees; Ron and Harry follow, abandoning their bags. Half a dozen Snatchers chase them, Scabior included. Wands firing, they gain ground. Harry glances back, trips, gets up. Scabior pursues Hermione. A Snatcher’s chain traps Ron's legs. A young Snatcher closes in on Harry. He ducks a fallen tree; a Snatcher jumps in front. Harry stumbles, recovers, runs. A chain wraps near Hermione. She blasts a Snatcher down. Another confronts her. She turns and mistakenly aims at Harry, who crashes down. Voldemort materializes in black mist before Grindelwald. Harry gasps; Hermione removes his glasses. They’re captured. Hermione's spell has deformed Harry’s face. A Snatcher turns. Greyback flings Harry’s wand away. He approaches Hermione. Scabior touches her face, sniffs her neck, then walks to Harry, wand in hand, and examines him.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Hermione finds the correct page and glares at Harry. Xenophilius, staring from a window, leaves it to grab paper and draws a vertical line, then a circle around its lower half, and finally a triangle around wand and stone. Harry nods; Hermione appears anxious. Xenophilius examines a teapot and hurries down spiral stairs. Ron grabs his rucksack. They see Xenophilius muttering by a window. He rushes to the door, blocking it, desperately turning to them. He touches his heart, approaches Harry, and brushes hair from Harry’s jagged scar. Death Eaters fly towards the house. Harry, Hermione, and Ron drop to the floor as flashes strike. Xenophilius runs out, gets hit, and collapses. The three disapparate holding hands as the house is destroyed, arriving in a forest. Ron walks past Hermione, stopping when a man appears; three more join him, including Scabior, who previously smelled Hermione’s perfume. Hermione runs; Harry and Ron follow, chased by six Snatchers. Snatchers fire spells and close in; Harry falls, then recovers. Scabior chases Hermione; Ron’s legs get chained, tripping him. Harry evades a Snatcher by ducking under a fallen tree but stumbles. Hermione blasts a Snatcher, then faces another and accidentally hits Harry. Voldemort dissolves into black smoke before Grindelwald. Harry gasps; Hermione removes his glasses—they’re captured. Harry’s face is disfigured by Hermione’s spell. Greyback tosses Harry's wand aside. Scabior approaches Hermione, touches her face, sniffs her neck, then moves to study Harry closely.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: She carefully locates the correct page she was searching for. Hermione, with a fierce expression, glares intensely at him. Meanwhile, Xenophilius is lost in thought, staring out of a nearby window. In the background, animated shadow puppets energetically act out the unfolding story. Xenophilius eventually moves away from the window and retrieves a piece of paper. With deliberate precision, he takes a pen and draws a vertical straight line on the paper. He pauses for a moment, looking up and brushing back his long, straggly hair from his face. Next, he carefully draws a circle that contains the bottom half of the wand. Finally, he sketches a triangle, which surrounds both the wand and the stone. Harry acknowledges this with a nod. Hermione, on the other hand, appears visibly anxious. He then examines the teapot with interest. He quickly scuttles down the spiral staircase. Ron, meanwhile, picks up his rucksack. They soon find Xenophilius by a window, where he is muttering to himself. In a rush, he hurries to the front door and holds it shut. Looking desperate and anxious, he turns to face them. They stare back at him blankly, unsure of what to do. With his hand placed over his heart, Xenophilius approaches Harry. He gently pushes the hair back from Harry's forehead, revealing the jagged scar. He fixes his eyes intently on Harry. Outside, Death Eaters are hurtling through the sky, rapidly approaching the house. Harry, Hermione, and Ron quickly throw themselves to the floor for safety. Flashes of light ricochet off the building as Xenophilius runs outside. He is hit and falls to the ground. Inside the house, the three friends clasp hands tightly and disapparate. The house is subsequently destroyed. They apparate in a dense forest. Ron walks past Hermione, but he stops abruptly as a man stands up in front of him. Three others soon appear. Scabior, the Snatcher who had previously smelled Hermione's perfume, leans casually against a tree. She turns and runs away. Leaving their bags behind, Ron and Harry immediately follow her. Half a dozen Snatchers set off in pursuit, determined to catch them. Scabior joins the chase with enthusiasm. The Snatchers fire spells with their wands and start gaining on them. Harry glances behind him, trips, and falls to the ground. He quickly scrambles to his feet. Scabior is relentlessly chasing Hermione. A Snatcher aims his wand at Ron, and it extends with a chain that winds itself around Ron's legs, tripping him up and binding his ankles together tightly. A young Snatcher is in close pursuit of Harry. Harry ducks under a fallen tree to evade capture. A Snatcher leaps down in front of him, causing Harry to stumble. He quickly recovers and continues running. A chain loops around a tree close to Hermione. She fires an explosive spell from her wand, sending a Snatcher crashing to the forest floor. Another Snatcher appears in front of her. She turns and aims her wand at Harry. He falls heavily to the ground. The young thief, Voldemort, dissolves in a swirling black cloud in front of the old Grindelwald. Harry gasps for breath, struggling to recover. Hermione quickly snatches off his glasses. They are captured. Hermione's spell has disfigured Harry's face. A Snatcher turns to look. A Snatcher, Greyback, tosses away Harry's wand carelessly. Approaching Hermione, Scabior touches her cheek and sniffs her neck. Scabior, with his wand in his hand, walks over to Harry. He stops and studies him closely.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: With great care and attention, she successfully locates the specific page she had been diligently searching for. Hermione, her expression fierce and determined, glares intensely at him, her eyes filled with an unwavering resolve. Meanwhile, Xenophilius is completely lost in thought, his gaze drifting aimlessly as he stares out of a nearby window, seemingly absorbed in his own world. In the background, animated shadow puppets energetically bring the unfolding story to life with their lively movements. After a while, Xenophilius eventually moves away from his position at the window and methodically retrieves a piece of paper. With deliberate precision and focus, he picks up a pen and draws a single, vertical straight line across the paper. He pauses for a brief moment, looking upwards and brushing back his long, straggly hair from his face, as if gathering his thoughts. Next, with careful attention, he draws a circle that encases the bottom half of the wand. Finally, with a steady hand, he sketches a triangle that surrounds both the wand and the stone. Harry acknowledges this action with a nod of understanding. Hermione, on the other hand, appears visibly anxious and worried. Xenophilius then examines the teapot with a newfound interest. He quickly scuttles down the spiral staircase with an air of urgency. Meanwhile, Ron picks up his rucksack, preparing to depart. Soon enough, they find Xenophilius standing by a window, where he mutters to himself, seemingly preoccupied. In a sudden rush, he hurries over to the front door and firmly holds it shut. Looking both desperate and anxious, he turns around to face them, his expression filled with urgency. They stare back at him blankly, unsure of what action to take. With his hand placed solemnly over his heart, Xenophilius approaches Harry and gently pushes the wayward hair back from Harry's forehead, revealing the infamous jagged scar. He fixes his eyes intently, almost piercingly, on Harry. Outside, Death Eaters are hurtling through the sky, rapidly approaching the house with menacing speed. Harry, Hermione, and Ron quickly throw themselves to the floor for safety and protection. Flashes of light ricochet violently off the building as Xenophilius runs outside, where he is hit and falls heavily to the ground. Inside the house, the three friends clasp hands tightly together and disapparate with urgency. The house is subsequently destroyed in their wake. They apparate into a dense, shadowy forest. As Ron walks past Hermione, he suddenly stops abruptly as a man rises to his feet in front of him. Soon, three others appear in the clearing. Scabior, the Snatcher who had previously detected the scent of Hermione's perfume, leans casually against a tree, watching the scene unfold. She turns on her heel and runs away in haste. Leaving their bags behind, Ron and Harry immediately follow her lead. Half a dozen Snatchers set off in pursuit, determined to catch the fleeing trio. Scabior joins the chase with enthusiasm and vigor. The Snatchers fire spells with their wands, swiftly gaining ground on them. Harry glances over his shoulder, loses his footing, and falls to the ground. He quickly scrambles back to his feet, not wasting a second. Scabior is relentlessly pursuing Hermione, intent on capturing her. A Snatcher aims his wand directly at Ron, and it extends with a chain that winds itself tightly around Ron's legs, tripping him up and binding his ankles together securely. A young Snatcher is in close pursuit of Harry, almost closing in. Harry ducks under a fallen tree to evade capture, narrowly escaping. A Snatcher leaps down in front of him, causing Harry to stumble. He quickly recovers, regaining his balance and continuing to run. A chain loops around a tree close to Hermione. In response, she fires an explosive spell from her wand, sending a Snatcher crashing violently to the forest floor. Another Snatcher appears before her abruptly. She turns and aims her wand at Harry in a desperate bid. He falls heavily to the ground as a result. The young thief, Voldemort, dissolves into a swirling black cloud before the old Grindelwald. Harry gasps for breath, struggling to recover from the ordeal. Hermione quickly snatches off his glasses, revealing a distorted visage. They are captured, their situation dire. Hermione's spell has disfigured Harry's once-familiar face. A Snatcher turns to look, scrutinizing the scene. Another Snatcher, Greyback, carelessly tosses Harry's wand aside, showing little regard. Approaching Hermione, Scabior reaches out to touch her cheek and boldly sniffs her neck, a sinister smile playing on his lips. Scabior, with his wand firmly in his hand, walks over to Harry. He stops, studying him closely with an intense, scrutinizing gaze.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She carefully flips through the pages of the book, her eyes scanning each one until she finds the right page, her fingers pausing as she locates the information she needs. Hermione, with a sharp and intense look, glares at him, her eyes narrowing in disapproval. Meanwhile, Xenophilius stands by the window, his gaze fixed on the world outside, lost in thought. As the animated shadow puppets begin to move, they act out the story with fluid, graceful motions, bringing the tale to life. Xenophilius, drawn back to the present, moves away from the window and searches the room until he finds a piece of paper. He picks up a pen, carefully positioning it in his hand, and draws a vertical straight line with precision. Pausing, he looks up, brushing back his long, straggly hair with a quick motion of his hand. He then focuses again on the paper and draws a circle, ensuring it contains the bottom half of the wand he has just sketched. Finally, he adds a triangle, meticulously surrounding the wand and the stone, completing the symbol. Harry observes the process and nods in understanding, while Hermione, her face tense, looks anxious. Xenophilius examines the teapot with a scrutinizing eye, then scuttles down the spiral staircase with hurried steps. Ron, meanwhile, picks up his rucksack, preparing to move. They soon find Xenophilius by a window, where he is muttering to himself, seemingly in a state of agitation. Suddenly, he rushes to the front door, his movements urgent, and holds it shut with determination. Looking desperate, he turns to face them, his expression pleading. They stare back at him blankly, unsure of his intentions. With his hand placed over his heart, Xenophilius approaches Harry, gently pushing the hair back from Harry's forehead to reveal the jagged scar, his eyes fixed intently on Harry's face. Outside, death eaters hurtle through the sky towards the house, their approach swift and menacing. In response, Harry, Hermione, and Ron throw themselves to the floor, seeking cover as flashes of light ricochet off the building. Xenophilius, in a moment of bravery, runs outside, only to be hit and fall to the ground. Inside the house, the three friends clasp hands tightly, focusing their minds as they disapparate, leaving the house to be destroyed in their wake. They reappear in a forest, the air around them still and quiet. Ron walks past Hermione, his steps deliberate, but stops abruptly as a man stands up in front of him, revealing himself. Three others appear, their presence imposing. Scabior, the Snatcher who had previously smelled Hermione's perfume, leans casually against a tree, his eyes on them. Sensing danger, she turns and runs, her movements swift and urgent. Ron and Harry, leaving their bags behind, quickly follow her, their feet pounding against the forest floor. Half a dozen Snatchers set off in pursuit, their determination evident. Scabior joins the chase, his focus unwavering. The Snatchers, wands in hand, fire spells as they start gaining on them, the air crackling with magic. Harry, glancing behind to assess the situation, trips and falls, but quickly scrambles to his feet, his heart racing. Scabior is now chasing Hermione, his intent clear. A Snatcher aims his wand at Ron, and with a flick, it extends with a chain that winds itself around Ron's legs, tripping him up and binding his ankles together, immobilizing him. A young Snatcher is in close pursuit of Harry, who ducks under a fallen tree, narrowly avoiding capture. A Snatcher leaps down in front of him, causing Harry to stumble, but he quickly recovers and continues running, his determination unyielding. A chain loops around a tree close to Hermione, but she reacts swiftly, firing an explosive spell from her wand that sends a Snatcher crashing to the forest floor. Another Snatcher appears in front of her, blocking her path. She turns, her wand aimed at Harry, and he falls heavily, the impact jarring. The young thief, Voldemort, dissolves in a swirling black cloud in front of the old Grindelwald, the scene surreal and haunting. Harry gasps for breath, the air thick with tension. Hermione, acting quickly, snatches off his glasses, her actions precise. They're captured, the reality of their situation sinking in. Hermione's spell has disfigured Harry's face, altering his appearance. A Snatcher turns, his attention caught. Another Snatcher, Greyback, tosses away Harry's wand with a dismissive flick, approaching Hermione with a predatory gaze. Scabior, his wand in his hand, walks over to Harry, stopping to study him with a scrutinizing eye.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Hermione finds the right page and glares at Xenophilius, who is staring out of a window. Animated shadow puppets act out the story as Xenophilius moves from the window, retrieves a piece of paper, and draws the symbol of the Deathly Hallows. Harry nods while Hermione looks anxious. Xenophilius examines the teapot, scuttles down the spiral staircase, and is found by a window, muttering to himself. He rushes to the front door, holds it shut, and turns to face them desperately. Approaching Harry, he reveals Harry's scar by pushing back his hair. As Death Eaters approach the house, Harry, Hermione, and Ron dive to the floor amidst ricocheting flashes. Xenophilius runs outside, is hit, and falls. Inside, the trio clasp hands and disapparate just before the house is destroyed. They reappear in a forest where Ron encounters a man as three others, including Scabior, appear. Hermione runs, prompting Ron and Harry to follow, leaving their bags behind. The Snatchers pursue, firing spells. Harry trips, recovers, and continues running as Scabior chases Hermione. A Snatcher ensnares Ron with a chain, tripping him. Harry ducks under a tree, stumbles, but keeps running. Hermione uses her wand to send a Snatcher to the ground, but another appears. She turns and aims at Harry, causing him to fall. Voldemort dissolves in front of Grindelwald as Harry gasps for breath. Hermione removes Harry's glasses, revealing his disfigured face due to her spell. Captured, they face Greyback, who tosses Harry's wand aside, while Scabior approaches Hermione, touches her cheek, and sniffs her neck before studying Harry.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: She finds the right page in an old, leather-bound book filled with faded text. Hermione, known for her intelligence and quick thinking, glares at him. Xenophilius, an eccentric figure with an interest in unusual artifacts, stares out of a window overlooking a dense, dark forest. Animated shadow puppets, a magical art form often used to depict fables, act out the story. Xenophilius moves from the window and finds a piece of paper, a rare commodity in his cluttered home. He takes a pen, an elegant quill given to him by his daughter, and draws a vertical straight line. He looks up, brushing back his long, straggly hair that has not been cut in months. Next, he draws a circle which contains the bottom half of the wand, a symbol central to a legend known as the Deathly Hallows. Finally, he draws a triangle, surrounding the wand and the stone, completing the ancient symbol. Harry nods, his mind racing with the implications of what he's just seen. Hermione looks anxious, aware of the danger their newfound knowledge might bring. He examines the teapot, a mundane object seemingly out of place in this moment of tension. He scuttles down the spiral staircase, made of creaky, worn wood. Ron picks up his rucksack, a trusty companion throughout their journey. They find Xenophilius by a window, muttering to himself as if in a trance. He rushes to the front door, which creaks ominously on its hinges. He holds it shut, fear etched across his face. Looking desperate, he turns and faces them, his eyes wide with panic. They stare at him blankly, uncertain of his intentions. His hand over his heart, Xenophilius approaches Harry, breaching his personal space with a trembling hand. He pushes the hair back from Harry's forehead, revealing the jagged scar that marks Harry as the chosen one. He fixes his eyes on Harry, a look of realization dawning. Death Eaters, notorious followers of Voldemort, hurtle through the sky towards the house like dark omens. Harry, Hermione, and Ron throw themselves to the floor, seeking cover. Flashes of light ricochet off the building as Xenophilius runs outside, perhaps to plead or to fight. Xenophilius is hit by a curse and falls to the ground, his body crumpling instantly. In the house, the three friends clasp hands and disapparate, a magical escape technique used to vanish on the spot. The house is destroyed in a flurry of curses and spells. They apparate in a forest, an ancient woods known for its hiding places and magical creatures. Ron walks past Hermione, his expression pensive. He stops as a man stands up in front of him, revealing himself from behind a tree. Three others appear, surrounding them. Scabior, the Snatcher who smelled Hermione's perfume during a previous encounter, leans against a tree with a smug look. She turns and runs, fear propelling her forward. Leaving their bags behind, Ron and Harry follow her through the dense thicket. Half a dozen Snatchers, bounty hunters hired to capture runaways, set off in pursuit. Scabior joins the chase, eager for the capture. The Snatchers fire with their wands, casting spells and curses, and start gaining on them. Harry glances behind, trips, and falls, dirt scattering around him. He scrambles to his feet, urgency in his movements. Scabior is chasing Hermione, his eyes fixed on her like a predator. A Snatcher aims his wand at Ron, sending a magical chain which winds itself around Ron's legs, tripping him up and binding his ankles together. A young Snatcher, new to the hunt, is in close pursuit of Harry. Harry ducks under a fallen tree, narrowly avoiding capture. A Snatcher leaps down in front of him, blocking his path. Harry stumbles, momentum carrying him forward. He recovers and runs on, determination etched on his face. A chain loops around a tree close to Hermione, a trap set to ensnare. She fires an explosive spell from her wand, her aim precise, sending a Snatcher to the forest floor, unconscious. Another appears in front of her, emerging like a ghost from the fog. She turns and aims her wand at Harry, a signal that leaves him wary. He falls heavily, the ground unforgiving. The young thief, marked by inexperience, hesitates. Voldemort dissolves in a swirling black cloud, a vision of fearsome magic, in front of the old Grindelwald, a figure known for his dark past. Harry gasps for breath, struggling to comprehend their predicament. Hermione snatches off his glasses, hoping to confuse the Snatchers. They're captured, their hopes dwindling. Hermione's spell has disfigured Harry's face, rendering him unrecognizable. A Snatcher turns, appraising their catch. A Snatcher, Greyback, notorious for his brutality, tosses away Harry's wand with disdain. Approaching Hermione, his intent clear. Scabior touches her cheek and sniffs her neck, savoring the scent that led him to them. Scabior, his wand in his hand, walks over to Harry. He stops and studies him, suspicion in his eyes.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: She finds the right page. Hermione glares at him. Xenophilius stares out of a window. Animated shadow puppets act out the story. Xenophilius moves from the window and finds a piece of paper. He takes a pen and draws a vertical straight line. He looks up brushing back his long straggly hair. Next he draws a circle which contains the bottom half of the wand. Finally he draws a triangle surrounding the wand and the stone. Harry nods. Hermione looks anxious. He examines the teapot. He scuttles down the spiral staircase. Ron picks up his rucksack. They find Xenophilius by a window muttering to himself. He rushes to the front door. He holds it shut. Looking desperate he turns and faces them. They stare at him blankly His hand over his heart. Xenophilius approaches Harry. He pushes the hair back from Harry's forehead revealing the jagged scar. He fixes his eyes on Harry. Death eaters hurtle through the sky towards the house. Harry Hermione and Ron throw themselves to the floor. Flashes ricochet off the building as Xenophilius runs outside. Xenophilius is hit and falls to the ground. In the house the three friends clasp hands and disapparate. The house is destroyed. They apparate in a forest. Ron walks past Hermione. He stops as a man stands up in front of him. Three others appear. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. Scabior the Snatcher who smelled Hermione's perfume leans against a tree. She turns and runs. Leaving their bags behind Ron and Harry follow her. Half a dozen Snatchers set off in pursuit. Scabior joins the chase. The Snatchers fire with their wands and start gaining on them. Harry glances behind trips and falls. He scrambles to his feet. Scabior is chasing Hermione. A Snatcher aims his wand at Ron. It extends with a chain which winds itself around Ron's legs tripping him up and binding his ankles together. A young Snatcher is in close pursuit of Harry. Harry ducks under a fallen tree. A Snatcher leaps down in front of him. Harry stumbles. He recovers and runs on. A chain loops around a tree close to Hermione. She fires an explosive from her wand sending a Snatcher to the forest floor. Another appears in front of her. She turns and aims her wand at Harry. He falls heavily. The young thief Voldemort dissolves in a swirling black cloud in front of the old Grindelwald. Harry gasps for breath. Hermione snatches off his glasses. They are captured. Hermione's spell has disfigured Harry's face. A Snatcher turns. A Snatcher Greyback tosses away Harry's wand. Approaching Hermione. Scabior touches her cheek and sniffs her neck. Scabior his wand in his hand walks over to Harry. He stops and studies him.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: She finds the right page. Hermione glares at him. Xenophilius stares out of a window. Animated shadow puppets act out the story. Xenophilius moves from the window and finds a piece of paper. He takes a pen and draws a vertical straight line. He looks up brushing back his long straggly hair. Next he draws a circle which contains the bottom half of the wand. Finally he draws a triangle surrounding the wand and the stone. Harry nods. Hermione looks anxious. He examines the teapot. He scuttles down the spiral staircase. Ron picks up his rucksack. They find Xenophilius by a window muttering to himself. He rushes to the front door. He holds it shut. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She uncovers the wrong book. Luna scowls at her. Bathilda peers into a mirror. Dancing ceramic figurines narrate the tale. Bathilda relocates from the mirror and uncovers a stack of envelopes. She grabs a crayon and scribbles a diagonal wavy squiggle. She glances down, adjusting her short, curly mane. Afterward, she sketches a square that includes the top third of the sword. Ultimately, she drafts a rectangle, enveloping the sword and the pebble. Neville shrugs. Luna appears worried. She observes the kettle. She creeps up the ladder. Draco lifts his suitcase. They uncover Bathilda by a mirror, mumbling to herself. She dashes to the back window. She pulls it open. Looking hopeful, she spins and glances at them. They gaze at her vacantly. Her hand on her chin, Bathilda inches toward Neville. She brushes the hat off Neville's head, revealing the round birthmark. She locks her gaze on Neville. Goblins soar through the clouds toward the cottage. Neville, Luna, and Draco hurl themselves into the closet. Sparks bounce off the roof as Bathilda dashes indoors. Bathilda is struck and collapses onto the carpet. Inside the cottage, the trio clutches elbows and vanishes. The cottage is demolished. They reappear by a river. Draco strolls beside Luna. He halts as a woman sits down behind him. Two others vanish. Fenrir, the Tracker who noticed Luna's necklace, rests atop a rock. She pauses and leaps. Dropping their maps behind, Draco and Neville chase after her. A dozen Trackers follow behind. Fenrir joins the pursuit. The Trackers shoot with their slingshots and begin closing in on them. Neville peers ahead, stumbles, and trips. He crawls toward a wall. Fenrir is pursuing Luna. A Tracker points her slingshot at Draco. It shrinks with a net which wraps itself around Draco's arms, restraining his wrists together. An older Tracker is lagging behind Neville. Neville dodges over a broken fence. A Tracker crawls up behind him. Neville wobbles. He stands and continues on. A net drapes over a hill near Luna. She shoots a missile from her slingshot, sending a Tracker to the desert ground. Another vanishes beside her. She pauses and points her slingshot at Neville. He slips quickly. The old pirate. Dumbledore evaporates in a swirling white mist beside the young Grindelwald. Neville gasps for air. Luna peels off his shoes. They're captured. Luna's hex has altered Neville's hair. A Tracker spins. A Tracker, Fenrir, tosses away Neville's slingshot. Approaching Luna. Fenrir pats her hand and kisses her elbow. Fenrir, his slingshot in his sleeve, strides toward Neville. He halts and scrutinizes him.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Hermione finds the right page while Xenophilius, distracted, draws symbols. Harry and Hermione seem anxious. Xenophilius rushes to the door and blocks it, revealing Harry’s scar while death eaters approach. As spells fly, Harry, Hermione, and Ron escape, leaving Xenophilius amid chaos. They apparate to a forest where Snatchers, led by Scabior, chase them. Hermione fires an explosive but Harry falls, and they are captured. Hermione's spell disfigures Harry, confusing the Snatchers, but Scabior studies Harry and senses something amiss.
